set request = ##class(%Net.HttpRequest).%New() set request.SSLConfiguration = "SSL_CONFIG" set request.Https = 1 set request.Server = "translate.yandex.net" set request.Location = "api/v1.5/tr.json/translate"
set keyFile = ##class(%File).%New("yandex-translate-api-key.txt") set status = keyFile.Open("R") if ($$$ISERR(status)) { return status } set key = keyFile.Read()
do request.InsertParam("key", key) do request.InsertParam("lang", origin _ "-" _ language)
set path = $NAME(@global@(domain, origin)) $$$FOREACH(key,value,path) do request.InsertParam("text", @value) $$$ENDFOR
set status = request.Get() if ($$$ISERR(status)) { return status } //do request.HttpResponse.OutputToDevice()
set response = $ZCVT(request.HttpResponse.Data.Read(), "I", "UTF8") set object = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() do ##class(%ZEN.Auxiliary.jsonProvider).%ConvertJSONToObject(response, , .object)
set list = object.text
set index = 1 $$$FOREACH(key,value,path) set @global@(domain, language, key) = list.GetAt(index) set index = index + 1 $$$ENDFOR return status
